jobDescription: About The Position Glossier is looking for a Data Scientist to help take our data practice to the next level. You will work closely with business stakeholders to unlock a new understanding of our ever-expanding base of customers and help drive the smart use of data at the organization. You will use your insights to identify impactful questions, scope projects, propose approaches, and help to drive them to completion. If you enjoy the end-to-end process (extracting, cleaning, and modeling data) of providing insight into customer behavior, digital products, and innovative marketing strategies, then we want to hear from you!
